BounceForwardsVelocity.doc: For vehicles on rails that are moving forwards, reverse our velocity.

FireOnStartUp.doc: Default=1; Set this to 0 if you don't want the PG to fire on startup.

GetLocalYawFromVector.doc: Turn a worldspace vector into a local space yaw

QueryFreeDriverSlot.doc: Returns a number that represents the first free driver slot on the vehicle.

QueryFreePassengerSlot.doc: Returns a number that represents the first free passenger slot on the vehicle.

QueryFreeTurretSlot.doc: Returns a number that represents the first free turret slot on the vehicle.

SplinePath_create.doc: Creates the spline path from the target list.

StopBackwardsVelocity.doc: Stops any backwards motion for vehicles on rails.

StopForwardsVelocity.doc: Stops any forward motion for vehicles on rails.

TurnOff.doc: Turn Off and cancel the current cycle (if any)

TurnOn.doc: Turn On and begin the first cycle

_Windowsetup.doc: Does the post spawn setup of the Window

_addtosoundmanager.doc: adds the current entity to the sound manager.

_adjust_SinkObject.doc: Called periodically to adjust the sinkobject every frame and adjust its velocity.

_adjust_fulcrum.doc: Called periodically to adjust the frustum every frame and update its angular velocity.

_barrel_setup.doc: Does the post spawn setup of the barrel

_continueskidding.doc: Continues the skidding animation of a vehicle.

_cratesetup.doc: Does the post spawn setup of the crate

_dmbox_decay.doc: Event to make the dmbox console line decay

_dmbox_goin.doc: Event to make the dmbox disappear

_ev_pulldown_child_killed.doc: Signaled when the sub menu is killed for one reason or another

_fadeout.doc: Fade the entity's alpha and scale out, reducing it by 0.03\n

_fall_SinkObject.doc: Called periodically to make a sink object fall away.

_gmbox_decay.doc: Event to make the gmbox console line decay

_gmbox_goin.doc: Event to make the gmbox disappear

_ladder_setup.doc: Does the post spawn setup of the ladder

_minicon_goin.doc: Event to make the miniconsole disappear

_notepad_copy.doc: Event sent when user selected Copy

_notepad_cut.doc: Event sent when user selected Cut

_notepad_find.doc: Event sent when user selected Find

_notepad_goto.doc: Event sent when user selected Go to line

_notepad_open.doc: Event sent when user selected Open

_notepad_paste.doc: Event sent when user selected Paste

_notepad_save.doc: Event sent when user selected Save

_notepad_saveas.doc: Event sent when user selected Save As...

_randomspawn_think.doc: The function that actually spawns things in.

_reset.doc: Reset's the Use Anim after it has no longer been touched.

_setactivestate.doc: event that sets up the proper skin for the useobject.

_showing_path.doc: Internal event for showing the path.

_showing_sounds.doc: Internal event for showing the sounds.

_smashthroughglass.doc: Think function for smashing through glass

_turnexitoff.doc: Internal event that turns the exit sign off.

_umledit_drag_timer.doc: Used to time mouse drag events

_update_animated_farplane.doc: Updates the farplane if it is being animated.

_updateprefix.doc: internal event - update the custom viewmodel prefix

_useobject_reset.doc: Resets the useobject to the start state after a certain amount of time.

activate.doc: Allow the useobject to be used.

activatenewweapon.doc: Activate the new weapon specified by useWeapon. handsurf allows specifying which hand to use for the player

activatepapers.doc: The activation of the papers item

activator.doc: Gets entity who last activated this trigger.

active.doc: make the SinkObject active, so that it will respond to players touching it.

add.doc: Add a new point to the camera path where the player is standing.

addmusictrigger.doc: Add a new music trigger where the player is standing.

addrandomspeaker.doc: Add a new sound where the player is standing.

addreverbtrigger.doc: Add a new reverb trigger where the player is standing.

addspeaker.doc: Add a new sound where the player is standing.

ai_off.doc: Turns the AI off for this actor.

ai_on.doc: Turns the AI on for this actor.

alarmnode.doc: Gets the name of the alarm node for the actor (must have type set to alarm for effect)

alarmthread.doc: Gets the name of the alarm thread for the actor (must have type set to alarm for effect)

alignonce.doc: Align the tempmodels to the direction they are traveling at the time they are initialized

alwaysdraw.doc: Set emitter/tempmodel to be alwaysdraw. Which can be turned off by alwaysdraw

ammo_grenade.doc: Returns how many grenades an AI has

angle.doc: get the angles of the entity using just one value.\n

angles.doc: If range is specified, the component needs two values; it will randomly pick a number in the range\n

animateonce.doc: Set a tempmodel to animate once and then get removed

animfinal.doc: Whether the animation was successfully finished

animloop_legs.doc: Called when the legs animation has finished.

animloop_pain.doc: Called when the pain animation has finished.

animloop_torso.doc: Called when the torso animation has finished.

arctotarget.doc: Make the projectile follow a normal arc on its way to its target

armwithweapons.doc: give player their primary and secondary weapons.

attachgrenade.doc: Used only by grenade return animations to tell the code when to attach the grenade to the actor

attachtoladder.doc: Attaches the sentient to a ladder

attackhandler.doc: Gets the current script that will handle attack events

attackplayer.doc: Force Actor to attack the player

auto_join_team.doc: Join the team with fewer players

autoaim.doc: Turn on auto aiming for the weapon

autodec.doc: Used to auto decrement the slider

autoinc.doc: Used to auto increment the slider

balconyheight.doc: minimum height a balcony guy must fall to do special balcony death

beam_offset_endpoints.doc: Make the beams endpoints offset to reduce the bunching up effect

beampersist.doc: Make the beams persist instead of blinking out

becomebomb.doc: Make the projectile into a bomb

bedead.doc: Forces the actor to be instantly and totally dead; no death animation is played

blockend.doc: Is the end of the sentient's block.

blockstart.doc: Is the start of the sentient's block.

bouncesound_hard.doc: Set the name of the sound that is played when the projectile bounces off hard surfaces

bouncesound_metal.doc: Set the name of the sound that is played when the projectile bounces off metal

bouncesound_water.doc: Set the name of the sound that is played when the projectile bounces off water

bouncetouch.doc: Make the projectile bounce when it hits a non-damageable solid

breakspecial.doc: tell ai to break special attack

camera_think.doc: Called each frame to allow the camera to adjust its position.

canhitowner.doc: Make the projectile be able to hit its owner

canmoveto.doc: returns a boolean if the AI can move to a point; for use in anim scripts

canseenoents.doc: returns 1 if the entities can see eachother, 0 if not; ignores any entities between them

cantpartialreload.doc: Prevents the weapon from being reloaded part way through a clip

censor.doc: used to ban certain contact when in parentmode\n

chargelife.doc: set the projectile's life to be determined by the charge time

chargespeed.doc: set the projectile's speed to be determined by the charge time

checkanims.doc: Check the animations in the .tik file versus the statefile

checkonground.doc: Check if exploding wall is on ground.

circle.doc: Set the tempmodels to be spawned in a circle around the origin\n

claypidgeon.doc: turn the entity into a non-solid shootable thing

clear_objective_pos.doc: Clears the position of the current objective,

clearfade.doc: Clear the fade from the screen

clearinvitemref.doc: used internally when the inventory is reset\n

clearowner.doc: Make the projectile be able to hit its owner now

clip_empty.doc: Empties the weapon's clip of ammo,

clip_fill.doc: Fills the weapons ammo clip with ammo from its owner

closeportal.doc: Close the area portal enclosed in this object

connect_paths.doc: Connects all navigation paths which intersect with the specified entity's volume

connecttoselected.doc: Makes the lan game list connect to the selected server

constantdamage.doc: Makes the explosion do constant damage over the radius

coord.doc: Prints out current location and angles

correctweaponattachments.doc: makes sure the weapons is properly attached when interrupting a reload

create_team.doc: Create a team in the current arena

curiousoff.doc: Turn off an actor's curious state

curiouson.doc: Turn on an actor's curious state

cut.doc: switch camera states immediately, do not transition

damageagain.doc: This event is generated each frame if explosion is set to damage each frame

damageeveryframe.doc: Makes the explosion damage every frame

deactivate.doc: Do not allow the useobject to be used.

dead.doc: Called when the player is dead.

deathembalm.doc: preps the dead actor for turning nonsolid gradually over time

deathhandler.doc: Gets the current script that will handle death events

deathsinkeachframe.doc: Makes the entity sink into the ground and then get removed (this gets called each frame).

deathsinkstart.doc: Makes the entity sink into the ground and then get removed (this starts it).

deleteallitems.doc: Delete all the items from the widget

deletegame.doc: Delete the currently selected game... for real

deletespawn.doc: delete this spawnpoint when spawning from this spawnpoint

detach.doc: detach this entity from its parent.

detachallchildren.doc: Detach all the children from the entity.

detachgrenade.doc: Used only by grenade return animations to tell the code when to throw the grenade

detail.doc: Set emitter/tempmodel to be detail. Which can be turned off by detail

dieinwater.doc: Make the projectile die when gets wet

dietouch.doc: Set the spawned tempmodels to die when they touch a solid

disconnect_paths.doc: disonnects all navigation paths which intersect with the specified entity's volume

disguise_accept_thread.doc: Gets the name of the thread for the actor to start when accepting papers

disguise_level.doc: Gets the disguise level of the actor. May be 1 or 2

disguise_period.doc: Gets the time between the end of one disguise behavior and start of the next

disguise_range.doc: Gets the maximum distance for disguise behavior to get triggered

distancetoenemy.doc: Get the distance from the Actor to its enemy

dmcantpartialreload.doc: Prevents the weapon from being reloaded part way through a clip for DM

dmdeathdrop.doc: Drops the player inventory in DM after's he's been killed

dmroundlimit.doc: in minutes; can be overridden by 'roundlimit' cvar

donedeath.doc: Makes the view jitter only happen once

donefiring.doc: Signals the end of the fire animation

donereloading.doc: Signals the end of the reload animation

doorclosed.doc: Called when the door finishes closing.

dooropened.doc: Called when the door finishes opening.

doroundtransition.doc: delayed function call to (possibly) determine round winner and restart next round

dropturret.doc: Makes the carryable turret have itself dropped

emotion.doc: The method of setting the facial expression of the Actor

endlevel.doc: Called when the player gets to the end of the level.

enemy_visible_change_time.doc: Get the last time whether or not the enemy is visible changed, in seconds

ensureforwardoffladder.doc: Ensures that the player went forward off the ladder.

ensureoverladder.doc: Ensures that the player is at the proper height when getting off the top of a ladder

explodeontouch.doc: Make the projectile explode when it touches something damagable

fade.doc: Set the tempmodel to fade out over it's life

fallingangleadjust.doc: Adjusts the weapons angles as it falls to the ground

findendpoint.doc: Find the endpoint of a beam

findenemy.doc: Finds the best enemy to target

finishroundtransition.doc: delayed function call to do the actual restart for the next round

finishuseanim.doc: Fires off all targets associated with a particular useanim.

finishuseobject.doc: Fires off all targets associated with a particular useobject.

fire_grenade.doc: Used only by grenade throw animations to tell the code when to throw a grenade

fireheld.doc: returns 1 if this player is holding fire,

fixedleash.doc: if non-zero, the leash will never auto-reset; if zero, the leash may auto-reset

flicker.doc: Set the tempmodel to change it's alpha every frame. Creates a flickering effect

follow_yaw_absolute.doc: Makes the follow camera yaw absolute.

follow_yaw_relative.doc: Makes the follow camera yaw relative (not absolute).

force_team_objective.doc: Return 1 if each team has a separate objective location

forceactivate.doc: Forces an entity to activate outside of the player's PVS

forcedrophealth.doc: Get if the sentient is forced to drop health no matter what level.nodrophealth is.

forcedropweapon.doc: Get if the sentient is forced to drop health no matter what level.nodrophealth is.

forcelandminemeasure.doc: Force a remeasurement to all landmines

forwardvector.doc: get the forward vector of angles

friction.doc: slowdown per second = [1 - (friction / physicsrate)] ^ physicsrate; physicsrate defaults to 10

fullstop.doc: Make the Vehicle Stop Moving... Completely!

getcurrentdmweapontype.doc: get the player's current DM weapon type.

getlegsstate.doc: Gets the player's current legs state name

getmaxs.doc: Get the maxs of the bounding box of the entity to maxs.

getmins.doc: Get the mins of the bounding box of the entity to mins.

gettargetentity.doc: Returns entity being targeted by the projectile generator,

gettorsostate.doc: Gets the player's current torso state name

getzone.doc: Gets the current entity zone. NIL if the entity is not in a zone.

ghost.doc: make non-solid but still send to client regardless of hide status.

gren_awareness.doc: gets the awareness of grenades in 0-100 percent chance of responding to a grenadewhen the AI sees it (applied

gun.doc: gets the gun to being used

gvo.doc: Retrieves the server's vote options file

hardlink.doc: Set the tempmodels linked to the model they are spawned from, so they move with it

hascompletelookahead.doc: returns true if there are no corners to turn on the rest of the AI's current path

hiteffect.doc: Sets the tiki it will spawn when it's hit

idleinit.doc: Puts the weapon into an idle state and clears all the anim slots

ignorebadplaces.doc: gets whether or not this AI guy will ignore bad places (0 = not suicidal)

injail.doc: returns 1 if player is in jail,

interrupt_point.doc: hint from animation scripts to AI code that now is a good time to switch animations

intervaldir.doc: the direction the AI would like to move to maintain its interval

inwardsphere.doc: Create the tempmodels in a sphere around the origin, and adjust their\n

isEscaping.doc: Return non-zero if escaping or assisting escape

isOpen.doc: Check to see if door is open (non-zero return value)

isSpectator.doc: Check to see if player is a spectator (non-zero return value)

is_enemy_visible.doc: 0 if the enemy is not currently visible, 1 if he is

isadmin.doc: checks if player is logged as admin

isturnedon.doc: Returns whether the generator is on or off.

item_droptofloor.doc: Drops the item to the ground.

jailassistescape.doc: Start the assist jail escape animation

jailescape.doc: Start the escape from jail animation

jailescapestop.doc: Stop either the escape from jail or assist animation

keepspawn.doc: keep this spawnpoint when spawning from this spawnpoint

kickdir.doc: Gets the direction the AI wants to kick

kill.doc: console based command to kill yourself if stuck.

killedeffect.doc: Sets the tiki it will spawn when it's destroyed

landmark_name.doc: Get the name of this landmark

lanlisting.doc: Makes this server list to LAN stuff when there's a choice between Internet & LAN servers

last_enemy_visible_time.doc: Get the last time the enemy was visible, in seconds

leanleftheld.doc: Returns 1 if this player is holding lean left key, or 0 if he is not

leanrightheld.doc: returns EV_RETURN if this player is holding lean right key, or 0 if he is not

leftvector.doc: get the left vector of angles

light.doc: Set the intensity of the light

lightOff.doc: Turn the configured dynamic light on this entity off.

lightOn.doc: Turn the configured dynamic light on this entity on.

linkcvartoshader.doc: Links the label's cvar to its shader

lod_model.doc: Set the model of the current viewthing

lod_think.doc: Called every frame to process the view thing.

loopfire.doc: Makes the weapon fire by looping the fire animation.

maxdist.doc: Gets the maximum distance the AI tries to keep between itself and the player

meleeattackend.doc: Is the end of the sentient's melee attack.

meleeattackstart.doc: Is the start of the sentient's melee attack.

mindist.doc: Gets the minimum distance the AI tries to keep between itself and the player

missionfailed.doc: Makes the player fail their mission,

movedir.doc: Returns a unit vector pointing in the current direction of motion, or zero if not moving.This still has meaning

moveplayer.doc: Move the player to the current path node position.

moving_from_anim.doc: The script model is moving based on an animation

nationality.doc: Get the nationality of an actor. Return values are ger, it, usa, uk, ussr and unset.

nationalityprefix.doc: get the three or five letter prefix that denotes the player's nationality

neverdraw.doc: Sets this entity to never draw

newActiveWeaponHand.doc: gets the hand of the new active weapon

next.doc: Go to the next path node.

no_idle.doc: Gets if the actor will not go into idle after playing an animation

no_remove.doc: Makes it so the item is not removed from the world when it is picked up.

noanimlerp.doc: Do not LERP to the next animation

nodeletegame.doc: Delete the currently selected game... for real

nonvislevel.doc: visibility level in range 0-1 below which an enemy is treated as non-visible

noparentadjust.doc: Set the widget to not be adjusted by the parent widget

noparentclip.doc: Set the widget to not be clipped by the parent widget

normal_damage.doc: The Normal Health of the Actor (0 - 100)

normal_health.doc: The Normal Health of the Actor

normaldraw.doc: Sets this entity to normal draw

noshadow.doc: Turns off the shadow for this sentient.

notactive.doc: make the SinkObject not active, so that it won't respond to players touching it.

notagaxis.doc: Forces the effect to use the model's orientation for randvelaxis and offsetalongaxis

notouchdamage.doc: Makes the projectile not blow up or deal damage when it touches a damagable object

notready.doc: makes this player not ready for the round to start

notshootable.doc: Makes the script slave not shootable

nowatch.doc: Set the current path node to watch nothing.

objectivebased.doc: Gets whether or not the game is currently objective based or not

offset.doc: If range is specified, the component needs two values; it will randomly pick a number in the range\n

offsetalongaxis.doc: If range is specified, the component needs two values; it will randomly pick a number in the range\n

oneshot.doc: Make this a one time trigger.

onfire.doc: Called every frame when the sentient is on fire.

openportal.doc: Open the area portal enclosed in this object

origin.doc: Get the origin of the landmark.

originbeamspawn.doc: Spawn a beam from the origin.\n

overcooked.doc: used when the cookable weapon has been over cooked.

overcooked_warning.doc: causes a warning sound to play that the grenade is about to be overcooked.

painhandler.doc: Gets the current script that will handle pain events

papers.doc: the level of papers the player currently has

parallel.doc: Set tempmodel to be parallel to the viewer

parentangles.doc: Set the tempmodels angles to that of its parent

parentlink.doc: Set the tempmodels linked to the parent, so they move with the parent model

pathdist.doc: returns total distance along current path to the path goal

patrolpath.doc: Gets the name of the patrol path for the actor (must have type set to patrol for effect)

pickup_done.doc: Called when the item pickup is done.

placeturret.doc: Try to place the carryable turret

pophelmet.doc: Pops a sentient's helmet off if he's got one

position.doc: The Position the Actor wants to be and should animate towards

prethink.doc: Make the projectile think to update it's velocity

prev.doc: Go to the previous path node.

previewreverb.doc: Test out the current reverb settings.

primaryfireheld.doc: returns 1 if this player is holding the primary fire, or 0 if not

putaway.doc: Returns whether or not the given weapon is being put away

quiet.doc: Makes the weapon make no noise.

randomroll.doc: Set the tempmodels so they pick a random roll value every frame

randvel.doc: If range is specified, the component needs two values; it will randomly pick a number in the range\n

randvelaxis.doc: If range is specified, the component needs two values; it will randomly pick a number in the range\n

ready.doc: Signals the end of the ready animation so the weapon can be used

reload_mg42.doc: Reload the mg42 - only used by machinegunner

remove.doc: Removes this listener the next time events are processed.

removewhenstopped.doc: Make the projectile get removed when it stops

replace.doc: Replace the current path node position/angle with the player's.

reset.doc: Resets the state of all sounds and triggers.

resetdimension.doc: Bring the HUD back to normal dimension (non-3D)

resetleash.doc: resets the AI's leash to their current position

resetreverb.doc: reset the reverb settings to a normal.

respawn_done.doc: Called when the item respawn is done.

respawnsound.doc: Turns on the respawn sound for this item.

restoresoundtrack.doc: Restores the soundtrack to the previous one.

rightvector.doc: get the right vector of angles

rotatedbbox.doc: Gets te entity's bbox to rotate with it.

roundbased.doc: Gets whether or not the game is currently round based or not

runanimrate.doc: Get the rate at which the run animation plays back

runheld.doc: returns 1 if this player is holding run key,

safesolid.doc: make solid but first make sure no one is in my bounds that is thinking.

saydone.doc: Even used by sound-only special case of say to trigger waittill saydone

scaleupdown.doc: Set the tempmodel to scale up to scale value and then down.

score.doc: Show the score for the current deathmatch game

scriptslave_followingpath.doc: Called every frame to actually follow the path

scriptslave_movedone.doc: Called when the script slave is doen moving

secfireheld.doc: returns 1 if this player is holding secondary fire, or 0 if he is not

secondaryammoinhud.doc: Makes the weapon show its secondary ammo to the hud.

secondaryfireheld.doc: returns 1 if this player is holding the secondary fire, or 0 if not

secondaryuse.doc: Puts the weapon into its secondary mode of operation

semiauto.doc: Sets the weapon to fire semi-auto

setreloadcover.doc: do this command to let the ai know it needs to reload; used to reload while going to cover

shadow.doc: Turns on the shadow for this sentient.

share_enemy.doc: internal code use only - shares an AI's enemy with his squad mates.

share_grenade.doc: internal code use only - shares an AI's grenade with his squad mates.

shoot.doc: Make the beam cause damage to entities that get in the way

showweapon.doc: Set the weapon to be show in the view

sound_awareness.doc: gets the awareness of sounds in 0-100 percent chance of hearing a sound withinhalf of the sound's radius' fades

spawnrange.doc: and 0 is the min range; if two numbers are specified, the larger is the max range.\n

sphere.doc: Set the tempmodels to spawn in a sphere around the origin.\n

spritegridlighting.doc: Calculates grid lighting for a sprite

startingammotoowner.doc: Internal event used to give ammo to the owner of the weapon

startoff.doc: Signals an emitter to start in the off state (no tempmodels are emitted)

steerinplace.doc: Set the vehicle to turn in place

stopatend.doc: Makes the vehicle slow down to a complete stop at the end of the path.

stopbind.doc: stops trying to bind a key to a command

stoponfire.doc: Stops the sentient from being on fire.

stopped.doc: sent when entity has stopped bouncing for MOVETYPE_TOSS.

stunend.doc: Is the end of the sentient's stun.

stunstart.doc: Is the start of the sentient's stun.

suppresschance.doc: sets the percent chance of doing suppressing fire when appropriate (0-100)

swipeoff.doc: Signal the end of a swipe

switchfacet.doc: Switch the current facet that we are editing.

takeall.doc: Clears out the sentient's entire inventory.

thinkstate.doc: current ai think state; can be void, idle, pain, killed, attack, curious, disguise, or grenade.

toggleitem.doc: Toggles the use of the player's item (first item if he has multiple)

toss.doc: entity has gravity applied to it.

triggersound.doc: Triggers the sound to play and schedules the next time to play.

trysolid.doc: Trys to make the door solid.

turndoneerror.doc: The error amount that turndone will occur for the turnto command.

turnspeed.doc: The turn speed of the actor.

turret.doc: Gets the turret of the actor.

turrettik.doc: Tiki of the turret to place

tweakladderpos.doc: Tweaks the player's position on a ladder to be proper

type_attack.doc: Gets the attack type of the actor.

type_disguise.doc: Gets the disguise type of the actor.

type_grenade.doc: Gets the grenade type of the actor.

type_idle.doc: Gets the idle type of the actor.

unattachfromladder.doc: Unattaches the sentient from a ladder

updatecvar.doc: Causes text box to update itself using the assigned cvar

updateendpoint.doc: Update the endpoint of a beam

updateinput.doc: Updates the current node with user interface values.

updateorigin.doc: Update the origin of a beam

updatepoweruptime.doc: Called once a second to decrement powerup time.

updatestats.doc: Update the stats on the missionLog

upvector.doc: get the up vector of angles

useheld.doc: returns 1 if this player is holding use,

uselasttraceend.doc: Makes this trace command use the end results of the last trace command

usestuff.doc: Makes the player try to use whatever is in front of her.

varycolor.doc: Sets the color to vary by 0 to -20% of specified color

vehicle.doc: Returns the vehicle the player is using. NULL if player isn't using a vehicle.

vehicleinit.doc: Initialized the Vehicle as the specified file

vehiclesoudnentity_updatetraces.doc: Updates the traces of a Vehicle Sound Entity

vehiclesoundentity_post.doc: PostSpawn of a Vehicle Sound Entity

viewangles.doc: get the angles of the entity.

viewanimate.doc: Cycle through the animations modes of the current viewthing\n

viewdetach.doc: Detach the current viewthing from its parent

viewdetachall.doc: Detach all the models attached to the current viewthing

viewlastframe.doc: Called when the view things last animation frame is displayed.

viewmodelanimfinished.doc: True if the player's current view model finished its animation.

viewnext.doc: Advance to the next frame of animation of the current viewthing

viewnextanim.doc: Advance to the next animation of the current viewthing

viewprev.doc: Advance to the previous frame of animation of the current viewthing

viewprevanim.doc: Advance to the previous animation of the current viewthing

viewscaledown.doc: Decrease the scale of the current viewthing

viewscaleup.doc: Increase the scale of the current viewthing

viewthing_think.doc: Called every frame to process the view thing.

viewthingnext.doc: Change the active viewthing to the next viewthing

viewthingprev.doc: Change the active viewthing to the previous viewthing

visiongetnaked.doc: Gets the player's current naked-eye vision.

voicetype.doc: Set voicetype to magic letter postfix

volumetric.doc: Set the effect to spawn volumetric sources rather than tempmodels

waitmove.doc: Move the script slave and wait until finished.

waittrigger.doc: If true, patrol guys and running men wait until triggered to move

wateronly.doc: makes the temp model remove itself if it leaves water

weapongroup.doc: Specifies weapon animation set to use in anim scripts

weapontype.doc: The Weapon Type of the Actor

wind.doc: Makes the temp model be affected by wind

writestats.doc: Used internally to write stats to a CSV file.

zone.doc: Get the current entity zone. NIL if the entity is not in a zone.

zoomoff.doc: makes sure that zoom is off
